author: Robin Herbst
comment: The camera view will not load most of the time  when away from home.  Then if it does it only certain cameras always at least one that doesn't  load just keeps spinning.  Very upsetting when motion deteted goes off and you can't  see why. Takes at least a minute to a minute and a half for the movement to show after detection goes off.  Very dissapointed  in sytem

author: Craig L
comment: Last update 1/18  really slow uploading cameras

author: Mike Mathis
comment: Great customer service!! Solid app!! They released a fix for a bug I noticed within 3 days. Great startup company, solid HD cameras, easy to install!! IFTTT integration is working flawlessly!!

author: Dustin Lineweber
comment: No symbols allowed in password? In 2017?! In a security product?!?!

author: Spyrus _
comment: So this app would normally be 4+ stars. But lately, it been saying that the system is offline, when it's not. I can turn the sound on for a camera, call the phone, and I hear it ringing. Video is also there. But the app says the system is offline? I try restarting the OPU (remotely) nothing changes. Of course not, because it's "offline". Need an update to fix this. Otherwise love this system on a budget. SERIOUSLY!  FIX the false OFFLINE status! I can't do anything but view video when this bug occurs (which is probably once/week lately)

author: Lynnette Hudson
comment: Needs an update for Alexa! I like the system but cuatomer service via email stinks! Developer's please create an update.  Alexa says she is having trouble accessing the skill.

author: Tia Curry
comment: We were hoping to use this as a security system. it didn't work for our house so we just use the cameras, but now it has an update I have to pay to use my cameras. It's also offline a lot

author: Patty Binns
comment: This application has been a godsend.  It allows me to keep up with my household whether I am upstairs or across town. I love it!

author: Greg Smith
comment: Goes on and off line a lot but needed to run alarm system

author: Tanyawith Wittayaudom
comment: Sale person never tells me that I need to pay for some features after 1 or 2 years pass

author: 吳政衛
comment: system very stable and easy for use.
title: nice product

author: dorothy mclaughlin
comment: Never really had a problem but now not excepting my password and will not let me reset
title: Cameras

author: Brent Qualls
comment: Had some errors to begin with but support helped get them fixed... Seems good so far
title: Never Worked

author: Randal Leggett
comment: Connection Socket Error 107 is always causing the app to crash.
title: Constantly getting an error

author: Prakash Gurnani
comment: Good software to manage the Mivalife systems. However, recently having a lot of timeout issues with the  video. The display keeps timing out. Issue noticed in last couple of weeks on the the Samsung phone. The video shows up fine on an iPhone.
title: Need it but not too happy with the video

author: Azell Smith
comment: Had the older Oplink System and cameras. This new generation of home video security is the wave of the future, thousands of miles away. Love it.
title: Love it

comment: I have it and love it
title: Home 8

author: Christian Brodtkorb Wiik
comment: Can't see what door is open when someone else arms. Should be possible to disable audio for arming/disarming. Also miss more features related to sensor status etc. Really bad idea to drop audio on last update :-(
title: Needs some work

author: Shane Jackson
comment: I used to be able to silence my ringer on my phone and still get the alarm because my media volume was up. Now it gets turned off with the ringer.
title: Notification

author: Niketsha Daniels
comment: Now that I updated it the siren doesn't go off when your phone is on vibrate I hate it now serves no purpose
title: Notification

author: tony sun
comment: I love this system, has alarm and smart devices all in one app, easy to set up and add new devices, also can has multiple locations, put one at my house and another in my parents house. Very user friendly.
title: Nice smart home system

comment: Write your suggestions for the app, I will improve it as I can.

author: troy austin
comment: Now it's going offline with new update and can't add family.
title: Offline

author: MJ Sulit
comment: I paid $299. for ours from Frys. We didn't  opt for the $399 for 3 years, we didn't know before we purchased ours. So far, it's working well. There were few instances that alarm went off that it was not til 2 minutes later that I got notified on my phone. IP cameras were awesome and very clear. Motion sensor is too sensitive and picking up the dogs movement so that's a thumbs down. Hope they fixed that or send us a replacement or something. There is no monthly monitoring if you purchase it somewhere else.
title: Great investment!

author: arun ramakrishnan
comment: Oplink is a good affordable security system with most types of accessories.  App works fine and allows easy setup and modifications. Basic free services are good enough for me although premium services are great if you prefer that.
title: Fast and easy setup. Many features.

author: scandamanone
comment: , working better,IS the ANDROID Wear PART IN BETA COMES UP ON MY moto360 BUT WONT DO ANYTHING.
title: Connection socket timeout

author: Evan Gallic
comment: App generally works well, but the Android Wear application doesn't appear to do anything.

author: Alan Elias
comment: The best!!!
title: Professional, fast app

author: Race O ́Bannon
comment: Update: It seems to be working properly in landscape mode now.  Original post: Since last update, the app won't display video in landscape mode. Works fine in portrait, but upon rotating screen, error message is displayed. Connection Unknown Error [100]. T-Mobile Note 4, Android 4.4.
title: Bug Report - fixed itself, apparently

author: Celljunkie 83
comment: Overall the app is pretty good and is almost real time with just a second or 2 of lag. Camera feeds a pretty good and the scan to activate mode is nice. Overall a good experience. Keep it up oplink.
title: Not bad for a diy system

author: Greg Katz
comment: Love Oplink and the app is good, however, can you please lose the scroll on the arming screen. Buttons would be 100% better!!!
title: Great

author: Kevin Wellman
comment: This is the easiest connected living app to manage and run!  Love my oplink system!

author: Lawrie Rikus
comment: Brilliant for monitoring cameras and security system.

author: Gina Gonzalez
comment: Great monitoring

author: Sarah Kulbeck
comment: Yeah I like locking things up with this app. President dec
title: Das best

author: Steve Kwon
comment: So easy to set up I didn't even know I was finished.
title: Cool stuff

author: Sean Hua
comment: The app UI is great!

author: james wang
comment: fast and easy install, close to live video streaming with no delay. I don't use all the sensors that come with the package but door/window sensors are reliable. one of the best features is the multi-view app for my 3 cameras at home.
title: Fast and easy

author: Arjun M
comment: Not hard to setup.  Pretty good mobile app. Camera holder is not that good.
title: This is exactly what I want
